author: fitzner
msg: updated build-files to avoid building/executing tests on mono (NUnit not working at the moment)
Adds support for building and using the C# binding with Mono (>= 2.10.1).
Changes the build.xml files to use xbuild instead of mdtool and bumps the dependency to Mono 2.10.1. Additional the HPTimer class is rewritten to use .NET methods and not Win32 methods.

author: danielsh
msg: Mention that PGP keys in the LDAP profile are now used by infra tools.

author: markt
msg: Fix concatenation of values in SecurityConfig.setSecurityProperty() (kkolinko)
